break-before.name: break-before
break-before.value: auto | avoid | avoid-page | page | left | right | recto | verso | avoid-column | column | avoid-region | region
break-before.appliesTo: block-level boxes, grid items, flex items, table row groups, table rows (but see prose)

break-after.name: break-after
break-after.value: auto | avoid | avoid-page | page | left | right | recto | verso | avoid-column | column | avoid-region | region
break-after.appliesTo: block-level boxes, grid items, flex items, table row groups, table rows (but see prose)

break-inside.name: break-inside
break-inside.appliesTo: all elements except inline-level boxes, internal ruby boxes, table column boxes, table column group boxes, absolutely-positioned boxes

orphans.name: orphans
orphans.appliesTo: block containers that establish an inline formatting context

widows.name: widows
widows.appliesTo: block containers that establish an inline formatting context
